title: Inside North Korea: 'We are stuck, waiting to die'
summary: For months, the BBC has been communicating in secret with three North Koreans living in the country. They expose, for the first time, the disaster unfolding there since borders were sealed three years ago: starvation, brutal crackdowns and no chance to escape.
